body_html: I just noticed that Dockerfile.devel-gpu does not include option --cxxopt="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0" to bazel build, which I added in my build as it was needed in the past to get things working and the build instructions still mention it now. Maybe the Dockerfile is missing this option?
body_text: I just noticed that Dockerfile.devel-gpu does not include option --cxxopt="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0" to bazel build, which I added in my build as it was needed in the past to get things working and the build instructions still mention it now. Maybe the Dockerfile is missing this option?
body: I just noticed that Dockerfile.devel-gpu does not include option `--cxxopt="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0"` to `bazel build`, which I added in my build as it was needed in the past to get things working and the build instructions still mention it now. Maybe the Dockerfile is missing this option?
